\hypertarget{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_sheet}{}\doxysection{Open\+XLSX\+::XLSheet Class Reference}
\label{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_sheet}\index{OpenXLSX::XLSheet@{OpenXLSX::XLSheet}}


The XLAbstract\+Sheet is a generalized sheet class, which functions as superclass for specialized classes, such as \mbox{\hyperlink{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_worksheet}{XLWorksheet}}. It implements functionality common to all sheet types. This is a pure abstract class, so it cannot be instantiated.  




{\ttfamily \#include $<$XLSheet.\+hpp$>$}

\doxysubsection*{Public Member Functions}

\doxysubsection{Detailed Description}
The XLAbstract\+Sheet is a generalized sheet class, which functions as superclass for specialized classes, such as \mbox{\hyperlink{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_worksheet}{XLWorksheet}}. It implements functionality common to all sheet types. This is a pure abstract class, so it cannot be instantiated. Inheritance diagram for Open\+XLSX\+::XLSheet\+:\begin{figure}[H]
\begin{center}
\leavevmode
\includegraphics[height=2.000000cm]{class_open_x_l_s_x_1_1_x_l_sheet}
\end{center}
\end{figure}

The constructor. There are no default constructor, so all parameters must be provided for constructing an XLAbstract\+Sheet object. Since this is a pure abstract class, instantiation is only possible via one of the derived classes.
